items.title: STRATEGY
items.subtitle: Strategy and structure
items.description: We start with deep analysis of your business, target audience, and competitors. We develop a site structure that guides visitors to the target action.

items.title: DESIGN
items.subtitle: Premium-minimal design
items.description: We create a unique visual style without templates. Lots of whitespace, clear typography, thoughtful animation — a website that stands out and is remembered.

items.title: SPEED
items.subtitle: Speed and SEO
items.description: We optimize every page for Core Web Vitals. Fast loading, proper semantics, technical SEO — your site will be loved by both Google and users.

items.title: INTEGRATIONS
items.subtitle: Integrations (payments/CRM/Telegram)
items.description: We connect payment systems, CRM, analytics, Telegram notifications, and any other services needed to automate your business.

items.title: SUPPORT
items.subtitle: Post-launch support
items.description: We don't abandon you after project delivery. Technical support, minor tweaks, consultations — we're here when you need us.

items.title: Expert website
items.description: Personal website for specialists, coaches, consultants. Sells your expertise and attracts clients.

items.title: Online store
items.description: Full e-commerce with catalog, cart, and payments. Sales automation and integrations.

items.title: Landing page
items.description: One-page website with high conversion for launching a product, service, or ad campaign.

steps.title: Brief
steps.description: We discuss goals, audience, and project tasks. Fill out the brief and define key success metrics.

steps.title: Prototype
steps.description: We create site structure, wireframes, and user scenarios. We agree on the logic before design.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: We develop a unique visual style. Each screen is a separate composition with attention to detail.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: We code in Next.js focusing on performance. Clean code, SEO optimization, fast loading.

steps.title: Content
steps.description: We fill the site with text and media. We help with copywriting and visual content selection.

steps.title: Testing
steps.description: We test on all devices and browsers. We test forms, integrations, and user scenarios.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: We deploy to production, set up domain, SSL, analytics. We hand over access and documentation.

steps.title: Support
steps.description: We stay in touch after launch. Technical support, updates, and project development.

faq.caption: Answers
faq.title: FAQ
faq.ctaSubtitle: Contact us — we'll reply within an hour

items.question: How long does development take?
items.answer: Timelines depend on project complexity. Landing page — 7–14 days, expert website — 14–21 days, online store — 21–45 days. Exact timelines are discussed after filling out the brief.

items.question: How much does a website cost? What affects the price?
items.answer: Cost depends on website type, number of pages, design complexity, and integrations. Landing page — from $600, expert website — from $1,000, online store — from $2,000. Exact cost is calculated individually.

items.question: What's included in turnkey development?
items.answer: Full cycle: brief and analytics, prototyping, unique design, responsive coding, basic SEO, analytics setup, testing and launch. You get a website ready to work.

items.question: Do I need a domain and hosting?
items.answer: Domain needs to be registered in advance or we'll help with selection and registration. Hosting — we use modern platforms (Vercel, Netlify) with free tiers for most projects.

items.question: How many revisions are included?
items.answer: Each stage includes a round of revisions: prototype, design, coding. Minor corrections — unlimited. Major concept changes are quoted separately.

items.question: Is there support after launch?
items.answer: Yes, 30 days of free support after launch: bug fixes, minor edits, consultations. After that — by support agreement or on-demand.

items.question: Will the website be SEO-optimized?
items.answer: Basic SEO is included: semantic markup, meta tags, sitemap, robots.txt, image optimization, loading speed. Promotion and content marketing — separate service.

items.question: What integrations are possible?
items.answer: Any: CRM (amoCRM, Bitrix24), payment systems (Stripe, PayPal), email newsletters, Telegram bots, booking calendars, analytics (GA4, etc.) and others on request.

items.question: How does payment work?
items.answer: In stages: 50% prepayment before starting, 50% after completion and acceptance. For large projects, splitting into 3 stages is possible. We work by contract.

items.question: What if I don't like the design?
items.answer: We approve each stage before moving to the next. If the design doesn't suit after the first iteration — we offer 2 alternative concepts. In case of complete disagreement — refund per contract.
